body_html:
Hey sorry you still have an issue. I made my response sound slightly confident exactly because the exception stopped for me. And I did try running your code. It didn't happen under python, but it did happen under ipython. After I removed the num_tokens=-1 bit, ipython stopped throwing the exception.

If you are confident, I'll try again later and try to make sure we have exactly same versions of everything (I did test on TF 1.3).

body:
Hey sorry you still have an issue.  I made my response sound slightly confident exactly because the exception stopped for me.  And I did try running your code.  It didn't happen under `python`, but it did happen under `ipython`.  After I removed the `num_tokens=-1` bit, `ipython` stopped throwing the exception.

If you are confident, I'll try again later and try to make sure we have exactly same versions of everything (I did test on TF 1.3).
